# Approve or Reject Inbox Task

# Description

Approve or reject an inbox task in Workday.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Inbox task ID - The ID of the inbox task. This field supports String type input.
* Action - The type of action: Approve or Reject.
* Comment - Justification for the action. This field supports String type input.









* Inbox task - Automatically generated output variable.
